pr_title: Call initTracer just once at beginning of main in http example

timeline.message:
Call initTracer just once at beginning of main.

This fixes a bug where each time a new HttpClient is instantiated, it adds a new SpanExporter to the
global OpenTelemetry SDK instance.

timeline.bodyText: Can we also change this to initTracerSdk(), since we're not really initializing a tracer here.
timeline.author: jkwatson
